short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to look up photos for appartments that already removed from view

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you receive an email invitation to check out the apartment but don't remember what it was? Save the photos and view them when the offer is deactivated.
 
Features: 
- Save up to 10 photos of the appartment you are inerested in
- Watch saved photos when offer is already deactivated
- Delete photos anytime you want with 1 button
- All photos stored in the browser memory
- All saved photos will be deleted automatically in 30 days since saving date
